name: illumio-core
label: Illumio Core
description: Illumio that provides a platform designed to help organizations protect their critical applications and data by creating secure zones and controlling access between workloads, regardless of whether those workloads are on-premises or in the cloud. This connector facilitates automated operations related to workloads, IP list and labels.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: Specify the URL of the Illumio server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: server_url
fields.tooltip: Specify the URL of the Illumio server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: API Key
fields.description: Specify the API Key to access the endpoint to connect and perform the automated operations
fields.name: api_key
fields.tooltip: Specify the API Key to access the endpoint to connect and perform the automated operations

fields.title: API Token
fields.description: Specify the API Token to access the endpoint to connect and perform the automated operations
fields.name: api_token
fields.tooltip: Specify the API Token to access the endpoint to connect and perform the automated operations

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.

operations.title: Create Workload
operations.description: Creates an workload in Illumio based on the organization ID, workload name, and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Organization ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the organization based on which you want to create workload in Illumio.
parameters.name: org_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the organization based on which you want to create workload in Illumio.

parameters.title: Workload Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the workload to create in Illumio.
parameters.name: name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the workload to create in Illumio.

parameters.title: Description
parameters.description: Specify the description of the workload to create in Illumio.
parameters.name: description
parameters.tooltip: Specify the description of the workload to create in Illumio.

parameters.title: Hostname
parameters.description: Specify the hostname of the workload to create in Illumio.
parameters.name: hostname
parameters.tooltip: Specify the hostname of the workload to create in Illumio.

parameters.title: Service Principal Name
parameters.description: Specify the principal name of the service based on which you want to create workload in Illumio.
parameters.name: service_principal_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the principal name of the service based on which you want to create workload in Illumio.

parameters.title: Public IP
parameters.description: Specify the public IP based on which you want to create workload in Illumio.
parameters.name: public_ip
parameters.tooltip: Specify the public IP based on which you want to create workload in Illumio.

parameters.title: Additional Properties
parameters.description: Additional fields, in the JSON format, based on which you want to create workload in Illumio.
parameters.name: additional_properties
parameters.tooltip: Additional fields, in the JSON format, based on which you want to create workload in Illumio.

operations.title: Get Workloads
operations.description: Retrieve a list of workloads from Illumio based on the organization ID and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Organization ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the organization based on which you want to retrieve workloads from Illumio.
parameters.name: org_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the organization based on which you want to retrieve workloads from Illumio.

parameters.title: Enforcement Mode
parameters.description: Select a enforcement mode of the workload based on which you want to retrieve workloads from Illumio. You can choose from the following options: Visibility Only, Full, Idle, or Selective.
parameters.name: enforcement_mode
parameters.tooltip: Select a enforcement mode of the workload based on which you want to retrieve workloads from Illumio. You can choose from the following options: Visibility Only, Full, Idle, or Selective.

parameters.title: Included Deleted
parameters.description: Select the option, if you want to include deleted workloads in the records from Illumio.
parameters.name: include_deleted
parameters.tooltip: Select the option, if you want to include deleted workloads in the records from Illumio.

parameters.title: Security Policy Sync State
parameters.description: Select a security policy sync state of the workload based on which you want to retrieve workloads from Illumio. You can select the option as Staged.
parameters.name: security_policy_sync_state
parameters.tooltip: Select a security policy sync state of the workload based on which you want to retrieve workloads from Illumio. You can select the option as Staged.

parameters.title: Security Policy Update Mode
parameters.description: Select a security policy update mode of the workload based on which you want to retrieve workloads from Illumio. You can choose from the following options: Static or Adaptive.
parameters.name: security_policy_update_mode
parameters.tooltip: Select a security policy update mode of the workload based on which you want to retrieve workloads from Illumio. You can choose from the following options: Static or Adaptive.

parameters.title: Visibility Level
parameters.description: Select a visibility level of the workload based on which you want to retrieve workloads from Illumio. You can choose from the following options: Flow Full Detail, Flow Summary, Flow Drops, Flow Off, or Enhanced Data Collection.
parameters.name: visibility_level
parameters.tooltip: Select a visibility level of the workload based on which you want to retrieve workloads from Illumio. You can choose from the following options: Flow Full Detail, Flow Summary, Flow Drops, Flow Off, or Enhanced Data Collection.

parameters.title: Policy Health
parameters.description: Select a policy health of the workload based on which you want to retrieve workloads from Illumio. You can choose from the following options: Active, Warning, Error, or Suspended.
parameters.name: policy_health
parameters.tooltip: Select a policy health of the workload based on which you want to retrieve workloads from Illumio. You can choose from the following options: Active, Warning, Error, or Suspended.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of workload that this operation should return from Illumio.
parameters.name: max_results
parameters.tooltip: Maximum number of workload that this operation should return from Illumio.

parameters.title: Additional Properties
parameters.description: Additional fields, in the JSON format, based on which you want to retrieve details from Illumio.
parameters.name: additional_properties
parameters.tooltip: Additional fields, in the JSON format, based on which you want to retrieve details from Illumio.

operations.title: Get Workload by ID
operations.description: Retrieves a specific workload from Illumio based on the organization ID and workload ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Organization ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the organization based on which you want to retrieve workload from Illumio.
parameters.name: org_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the organization based on which you want to retrieve workload from Illumio.

parameters.title: Workload ID
parameters.name: workload_id
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the workload to retrieve its details from Illumio.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the workload to retrieve its details from Illumio.

operations.title: Execute an API Call
operations.description: Sends an API request to any API endpoint based on specified HTTP method, endpoint, and other input parameters that you have specified, enabling flexible API interactions tailored to user needs.

parameters.name: method
parameters.title: HTTP Method
parameters.description:
Select an HTTP action for the request. You can select from the following options:  

DELETE 

GET 

PATCH 

POST 

PUT

parameters.title: Endpoint
parameters.name: endpoint
parameters.tooltip: Specify the target API URL path for example: Alerts/search. Do not include /api/v2/
parameters.description:
Specify the target API URL path for the request. 
For example, if the website is "https://example.com " and URL path is "/images/pic.jpg". The endpoint would be "/images/pic.jpg".

parameters.title: Query Parameters
parameters.name: query_params
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify any optional parameters to add to the URL and refine the request.

parameters.name: payload
parameters.title: Request Payload
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify data, as JSON, to be sent as the request payload (typically for POST or PUT requests).
